basic.name: Fel Flame (Q)
basic.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 210 damage to enemies.

basic.name: Drain Life (W)
basic.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 Health per second.

basic.name: Corruption (E)
basic.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.

heroic.name: Horrify (R)
heroic.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

heroic.name: Rain of Destruction (R)
heroic.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an {highlight}small area{/highlight} for 7 seconds{highlight}, that area will expand within it's duration{/highlight}. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.

trait.name: Life Tap (T)
trait.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.Activate to restore 25% of Gul'dan's Mana.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: {highlight}Drain life reduces the target self-heal and regeneration effects by 75% while it's active.{/highlight}

1.name: Rampant Hellfire
1.description: {highlight}Hitting Corruption affected targets with fel flame restores Gul'dan life by 22.5 this bonus is increased to 90 on heroes{/highlight}
1.quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.
rewards: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Consume Life
1.description: {highlight}Quest: Killing troops increase Gul'dan maximun health points by 0.3% up to 20%. Reward: If Consume life is fully charged it can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.{/highlight}

4.name: Harvest Life
4.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

4.name: Curse of Exhaustion
4.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 40%.

4.name: Drain Power
4.description: {highlight}Drain life will steal 7.5% spell power per second if used on corruption affected enemies, Gul'dan will retain the spell power for 4 seconds after stop draining{/highlight}

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.75 seconds.

7.name: Darkness Within
7.description: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health{highlight} and increases the mana restored to 60%.{/highlight}

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 120 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an {highlight}small area{/highlight} for 7 seconds{highlight}, that area will expand within it's duration{/highlight}. Each meteor deals 165 damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: {highlight}Activate to consume a enemy or allied hero body to absorb their maximum health points, the extra health granted will decay over 15 seconds.{/highlight}

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Drain Hope
16.description: {highlight}Activate to channel for 1.5 second, and then instantly teleport and cast drain life on all enemies in range.{/highlight}
passives: Enemies that take full Drain life take additional 8% damage on the end

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 12% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Echoed Corruption
16.description: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

20.name: Ruinous Affliction
20.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 268 damage.{highlight}Each time an enemy hero is hit, they are marked by Gul'dan's envy, stealing all healing received by 40% for 6 seconds. Receiving extra stacks resets the duration.{/highlight}
